backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with all service, order, profile, payment, and Stripe-related types and initializes maps and state variables for backend data storage.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old actor state to the new format by adding a stripeConfiguration field initialized to null.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of numerous frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables for light/dark themes and applies base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading the main script and Tidio chat widget.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, providers, and layout for all pages including product, payment, and order routes.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Protects routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to login and showing a loading state during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/BrandFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, contact info, and a dynamic caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Provides the sticky site header with navigation, authentication controls, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/BrandLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with the brand header and footer, providing a consistent layout structure.
frontend/src/components/OtpDemoField.tsx: Implements a demo OTP generator and verifier with input slots and validation messaging.
frontend/src/components/ProductAddToCart: Handles sample selection, form validation, and order creation flow for adding a product to cart.
frontend/src/components/ProductOrderForm: Renders brand name and description fields with word counting for product order forms.
frontend/src/components/ProductSampleSel: Displays selectable sample images with highlighting for the chosen option.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: Shows a service’s icon, name, price, delivery time, and optional action element.
frontend/src/constants/premiumServices.t: Defines fixed premium service metadata and helper functions to retrieve or map service data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToCart.ts: Provides mutations for adding items to cart and querying caller orders using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrderVerifica: Hooks for checking admin status, confirming orders after payment, fetching orders by status, and fetching notification requests using an actor and React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthState.ts: Derives authentication state from Internet Identity, exposing principal and flags for initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useConfirmationEmailR: Mutation hook to submit confirmation email requests and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useConfirmationMessag: Fetches the confirmation message template from the actor via React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateCheckoutSess: Creates a Stripe checkout session through the actor, parsing the returned JSON session.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for creating, loading, and managing Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderPayment.ts: Mutation hook to update an order's payment status and refresh caller order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Fetches available services from the actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeConfiguratio: Hooks for checking Stripe configuration status and updating Stripe configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeVerification: Hooks for verifying Stripe payment and checking Stripe session status.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupport.ts: Hooks to submit support requests and fetch support request lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile and basic profile using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom black‑and‑gold theme variables, utilities, and service card styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/BusinessCardPage.tsx: Product page displaying business card design details, banner, description, and add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a simple contact page with email and WhatsApp links plus hover styling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with service selection, form handling, cart creation, and admin/payment logic.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the landing page with hero content, product list, and premium services navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides Internet Identity login flow and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LogoDesignPage.tsx: Shows product details for logo design and includes an add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation after payment and blocks access unless payment is verified.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows payment cancellation details and offers retry and dashboard navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentPage.tsx: Displays order details and initiates Stripe Checkout sessions, handling loading, errors, and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies Stripe payment status, confirms the order, and redirects to the confirmation page or shows errors.
frontend/src/pages/PhotoFramePage.tsx: Shows the Photo Frame product details, preview image, and add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Lists premium service prices and displays supported payment methods like Stripe and PayPal.
frontend/src/pages/ProductBannerPage.tsx: Displays product banner previews with toggle controls and includes an add‑to‑cart section.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all premium services with an Order Now flow that redirects based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity signup and basic profile creation with validation and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TrackOrderPage.tsx: React page that fetches caller orders, locates one by ID, and displays its status, payment info, and navigation options with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/utils/stripeOrderMapping.ts: Converts an ExpandedOrder into a Stripe-ready ShoppingItem array by parsing price and building product metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read query and hash parameters, including helpers for Stripe session and secret values.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Word-count and email validation helpers enforcing a 1000-word description limit and basic email format checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the restoration of product flow, routing fixes, Stripe payment integration, and known issues.
